TopicTitle: My prediction for Kerbal Space Program (which could go wrong)

Articles.Content:
I predict that Kerbal Space Program will win several indie game awards when such a time comes since it is now officially released. Now, this is just a prediction that could be wrong. In fact, it is so awesome it may even get Indie Game of the Year. Those are my predictions.

Feel free to predict in this thread or make a comment.

Its going to get awards sooner or later. Hell it has gotten some of the highest reviews some gaming sites have ever seen (IGN I think...) Squad has put a lot of effort into making this game. Unlike most devs they actually listen to the community, of course they only do so because we have a mature, polite, and responsible fan base here.

This is one of the most if not the most polished early access game I have ever played and has a pretty awesome community and modding scene out there.

If it doesn't win a bunch of awards I'm going to start crying game journalists sellouts.
